thread.title: ITG Says It May Pay a Record $20.3 Million Dark Pool Fine
thread.title_full: ITG Says It May Pay a Record $20.3 Million Dark Pool Fine - Bloomberg Business

author: Sam Mamudi
title: ITG Says It May Pay a Record $20.3 Million Dark Pool Fine
text:
Investment Technology Group Inc. is in talks to settle allegations its equity dark pool ran afoul of U.S. regulations, with the possibility of paying a record $20.3 million penalty.
The discussions were disclosed in an ITG statement Wednesday. The broker said the case related to an experiment it ran in 2010 and 2011 that broke Securities and Exchange Commission rules.
In the same press release, ITG said Kevin J.P. OHara resigned from its board on July 23.
